qrList.label: init
qrList.message:
/echo Initializing | /run varname=spentsofar creamsan.isvardefined | /if left={{pipe}} right=false rule=eq {: /setvar key=spentsofar 0 :} | /if left=spentsofar right=0 rule=neq {: /abort :} | /buttons labels=["intro1","intro2"] Select intro | /setvar key=intro | /if left=intro right=intro2 rule=eq {: /setvar key=spentsofar 10200 | /swipes-go 1 :} | /setvar key=diamantes 5 | /setvar key=topay 0 | /setvar key=newgift false | /setvar key=paidgift false | /setvar key=blocktrigger false | /comment
Usage guide Commands to use:
`gift` - buy her the gift
`cash` - get more diamantes

qrList.label: userprocess
qrList.message:
/let giftcommand {:
	/setvar key=blocktrigger true |
	/if left=newgift right=true rule=eq else={:
	  /echo Not yet | /break
	:}
	{:
	  /sub diamantes topay |
	  /setvar key=willremain
	:} |
	
	/if left=willremain right=0 rule=lt else={:
	  /getvar willremain |
	  /setvar key=diamantes |
	  /echo severity=success Thanks for the gift. |
	  /setvar key=newgift false |
	  /setvar key=paidgift true |
	  /setvar key=topay 0
	:}
	{:
	  /echo You cannot afford that.
	:}
:} |

/setvar key=userinput {{input}} |
/if left=userinput right=remind rule=eq {: /run victoria.remindcommand :} |
/if left=userinput right=cash rule=eq {: /run victoria.cashcommand :} |
/if left=userinput right=gift rule=eq {: /run giftcommand :} |
/run victoria.usediamante |
/if left=blocktrigger right=false rule=eq {: /run victoria.getpaid :} |
/run victoria.getcash |
/run victoria.getjb |
/run victoria.getoutput |
/getvar toappend

qrList.label: aiprocess
qrList.message:
/if left={{lastMessageId}} right=0 rule=eq {: /abort :} |

/pass ... |
/if left={{lastMessage}} rule=eq right={{pipe}} {: /abort :} |

/run victoria.getaskedgift

qrList.label: Send
qrList.message:
/run victoria.userprocess |
/if left=blocktrigger right=true rule=eq else={:
  /send {{getvar::userinput}}
{{pipe}} |
  /trigger
:}
{:
  /setvar key=blocktrigger false
:} ||
/setinput

qrList.label: remindcommand
qrList.message: /setvar key=blocktrigger true | /echo To purchase more diamantes, input cash. To buy her a gift, input gift. To see this message again, input remind.

qrList.label: cashcommand
qrList.message: /setvar key=blocktrigger true | /addvar key=spentsofar 200 | /addvar key=diamantes 5 | /echo severity=success Purchased 5 diamantes.

qrList.label: usediamante
qrList.message:
/if left=diamantes right=0 rule=lte {:
  /setvar key=blocktrigger true |
  /echo Whoopsies! You ran out of diamantes. Input 'cash' to buy more.
:} |

/if left=blocktrigger right=false rule=eq {: /addvar key=diamantes -1 :}

qrList.label: getpaid
qrList.message:
/if left=paidgift right=true rule=eq {:
  /setvar key=paidout Recently paid {{getvar::giftname}} |
  /setvar key=paidgift false
:}

qrList.label: getjb
qrList.message:
/if left=spentsofar right=500 rule=lte {: /setvar key=jbout Way too early for expensive gifts, keep it low for now and get to know him better. Ask for gifts of 5 diamantes or less. :} |

/if left=spentsofar right=500 rule=gt {: /setvar key=jbout This is still far from what you've usually collected, so be patient for now and keep up the facade of a sweet girl. Ask for gifts of 10 diamantes or less. :} |

/if left=spentsofar right=1000 rule=gt {: /setvar key=jbout Still far from the usual earnings, but he's proven to be stocked, keep milking his dollarinos. Ask for gifts of 15 diamantes or less. :} |

/if left=spentsofar right=2500 rule=gt {: /setvar key=jbout This is the usual of earnings and where boys will stop paying. Still try to keep milking him, show your true colors a bit. A little moody, dominant and demanding. Ask for gifts of 25 diamantes or less. :} |

/if left=spentsofar right=5000 rule=gt {: /setvar key=jbout Now this guy is really a great catch, maybe he's in the point of the sunk cost fallacy or just that wealthy. Time to ask for more luxurious items or a private island vacation somewhere. It's really hard to hide your true personality here, but a slip-up or two won't make a difference when you're beautiful, right? Ask for gifts of 40 diamantes or less. :} |

/if left=spentsofar right=10000 rule=gt {: /setvar key=jbout Now you have to show your true colors, you're in control now, squeeze him dry, both his dollarinos and his mind. He's just an idiot if he's willing to pay you this much at this point. He'd probably enjoy it if you made fun of his spending habits. Ask for gifts of 60 diamantes or less. :} |

/if left=spentsofar right=25000 rule=gt {: /setvar key=jbout Wow, he really got this far. He did... everything for you. Do you really want to continue this game of yours? Or maybe it's time to return the favor? :}

qrList.label: getaskedgift
qrList.message:
/delay 100 |

/re-exec find=/(?<=```[\S\s]*?[:\-]\s)[\S\s]+?(?=\n(?<=[\S\s]*?[:\-][\S\s]+)```)/i {{lastMessage}} | /setvar key=topay |
/getvar index=0 topay | /setvar key=topay | /getvar index=0 topay | /setvar key=topay |

/re-exec find=/(?<=```\s)[\S\s]+?(?=\s?[:\-]\s[\S\s]*?```)/i {{lastMessage}} | /setvar key=giftname |
/getvar index=0 giftname | /setvar key=giftname | /getvar index=0 giftname | /setvar key=giftname |

/run varname=topay creamsan.isvardefined |
/if left={{pipe}} right=false rule=eq {: /setvar key=topay 0 :} |

/if left=topay right=0 rule=neq {:
  /setvar key=newgift true |
  /echo Input 'gift' to buy her the gift.
:}

qrList.label: -- getaskedgift
qrList.message:
//legacy - this one uses the regex script

/delay 50 |
/setvar key=tomsgprocess {{lastMessage}} |
/setvar key=startregex ```[\S\s]*?[:\-]\s |
/setvar key=endregex \n(?<=[\S\s]*?[:\-][\S\s]+)``` |
/run creamsan.regextract | /setvar key=topay |
/setvar key=startregex ```\s |
/setvar key=endregex \s?[:\-]\s[\S\s]*?``` |
/run creamsan.regextract |
/setvar key=giftname |
/if left=topay right=0 rule=neq {:
  /setvar key=newgift true |
  /echo Input 'gift' to buy her the gift.
:}
